example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حيا) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP مراد) (SBAR-NOM-OBJ (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذين) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP قاوموا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الغزو) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الاسرائيلي) (PUNC .)

arg.g: those who resisted the Israeli invasion
